segments.text: She is so beautiful , isn't she ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , she is so charming . I like her , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's said that her new movie is going to come out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Isn't it silly to see a movie that you know nothing about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I already told you , because Julia Roberts is in it . I like her because she is not only a great actor but also is very generous to give a lot to many kinds of charities .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , she is great . I also admire her for her concern about society .
segments.speaker: S2
